text: Snickers is a chocolate bar made by Mars, Incorporated. It is nougat topped with caramel and peanuts, coated in milk chocolate. It was introduced in 1930. It has had sales of over $2 Billion around the world. In the United Kingdom, Isle of Man, and Ireland, Snickers was sold as Marathon until 1990.Snickers Marathon - Long Lasting Energy Bar , Snickers Marathon corporate website. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Chocolate bars Category:Mars, Incorporated
title: Snickers
